thread.title: Northwestern guard tying her shoe mid-play ends exactly as you think it would
thread.title_full: Northwestern guard tying her shoe mid-play ends exactly as you think it would

author: Kofie Yeboah
title: Northwestern guard tying her shoe mid-play ends exactly as you think it would
text:
Not well.
As Northwestern women’s basketball took on Rutgers, gameplay came to a stop. 
Kind of.
Maybe not the best time to tie your shoe... #SCNotTop10 
A post shared by SportsCenter (@sportscenter) on Feb 23, 2017 at 6:58pm PST 
Ashley Deary saw that one of her shoes was untied. Did she use one of her team’s timeouts? 
Nah. As someone that doesn’t like to pause their video games when I have to do something, I respect that.
Ashley Deary just bent down to tie her shoe, let go of the ball, and Rutgers stole it. Really.
— Max Gelman (@MaxGelman) February 24, 2017 Despite this hilarious turnover, the Wildcats were able to take care of Rutgers, 60-38.
